By: Rand Fishkin April 12, 2005 An Achievement Worthy of Celebration SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Bill Slawski, bragadocchio on Cre8asite forums, celebrates his 10,00th post today. A milestone by any stretch of the imagination, Bill has contributed literally 10,000 useful, creative, thoughtful pieces of advice and help to his community for years now.Drop by the party thread and drop Bill a line. He deserves the praise of the entire SEO community, not just those at cre8asite. Bravo! Bill. Copied! Back to Top
